    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Velikonočni izdelki</string>
            <string language="en">Eastern eggs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Östliche Eier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oeufs orientaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ovos orientais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uova orientali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανατολικά αυγά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Huevos del este</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Po različnih virih poiščejo podatke o zgodovini praznika po pokrajinah v Sloveniji in izdelajo bilten, Izdelava plakata: velika noč nekoč in danes. Ob pomoči zunanje sodelavke spoznajo tehniko barvanja pirhov nekoč, Barvajo pirhe s sodobnimi pripomočki, Izdelajo izdelke iz kartona , papirja (zajčki, piščančki, voščilnice) Spoznajo pomen delitve dela in sodelujejo v skupini, Pripravijo razstavo in vrednotijo opravljeno delo</string>
            <string language="en">How to organize different school activities regarding the Easter.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">izvedba</string>
            <string language="en">realization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">velika noč</string>
            <string language="en">easter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pirh</string>
            <string language="en">easter egg</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man die unterschiedlichen Schuleaktivitäten 
betreffend sind das Ostern organisiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment organiser différentes activités 
d'école concernant Pâques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como organizar as atividades diferentes da escola
a respeito do Easter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come organizzare le attività differenti della 
scuola per quanto riguarda la Pasqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να οργανώσει τις διαφορετικές σχολικές 
δραστηριότητες σχετικά με το Πάσχα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo ordenar diversas actividades de la escuela 
con respecto a la Pascua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Realisierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ostern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
